q: That's just Philly. When I play bad, they boo." Matt Geiger missed 10 of 14 shots, and kept losing rebounds to the Raptors. When rookie Todd MacCullough replaced him, the crowd cheered. The crowd getting on Matt Geiger , and then at the end of the game he ended up being one of the heroes, said Allen Iverson , who scored 37 points. "It's tough. nomination for president in 2012. Mr. Mike Pence ruled out a White House bid in a letter to supporters that also fueled speculation he is instead planning a run for governor. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in the letter. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.

Proponents say the two parks proposed in the legislation would stimulate tourism, create jobs and recognize a civil rights icon whose story is known worldwide. These two national parks in Maryland and Auburn, N.Y., would provide an important place where men and women of all backgrounds can come together and reflect on the significance of her life, Kirsten Gillibrand said.
